casebody.data:
In the Matter of ENAUD WINE & SPIRIT CORPORATION, Bankrupt. Charles C. HARRIS, Petitioner-Appellee, v. Herman GOETZ, Trustee-Appellant. No. 42. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 4, 1935. Finkelstein & Jacobs, of New York City (Marcy Finkelstein and David Jacobs, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Harold Gilbert, of New York City,. for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
